extendedInfo.description: A Music Player that lets you get lyrics for almost all songs on your smartphone irrespective of the language.There are other apps that perform similar functions but there isn't a single app that gets the lyrics for Tamil and Hindi songs.That was the main motive for developing this app.This is a Beta Version. A bug free version will be released soon.Special Features :*â«* Get lyrics not only for the English Songs but also for songs in Tamil and Hindi.More languages are being added. *â«* Add your lyrics to your Favourites list which can be accessed directly from the In-App Home Screen!*â«* Loaded lyrics will be available offline*â«* Meager data consumption*â«* Two ThemesFeatures : â Media player functionalityâ PlayListsâ Search for Lyrics by typing words, artist name, song title, etcâ Browse Lyrics OFFLINEâ 4*1 Widgetâ Notification with Media Control buttons (for ICS +)â control music playback from Lock Screen ( for ICS +) â Report Missing Lyrics facility which is enabled by default. Once we are reported of the missing Lyrics, We'll try to add it for you in least possible time. * View and edit detailed tag info for albums and songs* Supports installation to SD card. Please note that due to restrictions within the Android OS, the widget will be disabled when the app is on the SD card. We are working hard to bring in Lyrics for almost songs in as many languages as possible.For any feedback or Suggestions, contact us at lyricize@festalize.comTags music,MP3,musicplayer,player,song lyrics,tamil lyrics,hindi lyrics,audio,lyrics,Lyrics, lyric, music, lyrics for music, song lyrics

reviews.comment: Hey! Getting lyrics for Tamil songs first time.. good work, really.. I found some lyrics are missing.. we\'ll help u to add the missing.. keep going..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful App
reviews.comment: It us a good and useful app. It has got most of the lyrics for Tamil, Hindi and English songs. If lyrics are missing for some songs, then it sends the missing report. But the biggest drawback is you can\'t add the lyrics on your own.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better app
reviews.comment: Most of lyrics play.. but it takes the website name from which the song was downloaded and says lyrics not found.. it doesnt filter.. otherwise its best app..
reviews.author: Gokul Ashok

reviews.title: Usefull
reviews.comment: It is nice but slow it takes lot of time in searching and not so much accurate . But the concept is really very nice plzz developer work on its speed . Cheers
reviews.author: Kunal Gupta

reviews.title: grt wrk by developers
reviews.comment: its a grt wrk done by d developers n deserve a 5*

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Really very nice application.now I don\'t need to find lyrics odd my songs.if it is able to add lyrics with the songs permanently, then it would be best for me.
